content: What popular 90s sitcom featuring six friends living in New York City was originally titled 'Insomnia Cafe'?

The popular 90s sitcom you're referring to is "Friends." It originally was going to be titled "Insomnia Cafe," named after the coffee shop where many of the characters gathered. However, the name was changed before the show premiered in 1994. "Friends" became a massive hit, running for ten seasons and becoming an iconic part of television history.
